title: 2016–17 Lafayette Leopards men's basketball team
text:
The 2016–17 Lafayette Leopards men's basketball team represented <a href="Lafayette%20College">Lafayette College</a> during the <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20men%27s%20basketball%20season">2016–17 NCAA Division I men's basketball season</a>. The Leopards, led by 22nd-year head coach <a href="Fran%20O%27Hanlon">Fran O'Hanlon</a>, played their home games at the <a href="Kirby%20Sports%20Center">Kirby Sports Center</a> in <a href="Easton%2C%20Pennsylvania">Easton, Pennsylvania</a> as members of the <a href="Patriot%20League">Patriot League</a>. They finished the season 9–21, 5–13 in Patriot League play to finish in a tie for ninth place. As the No. 10 seed in the <a href="2017%20Patriot%20League%20Men%27s%20Basketball%20Tournament">Patriot League Tournament</a>, they lost in the first round to <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Loyola%20Greyhounds%20men%27s%20basketball%20team">Loyola (MD)</a>.
Previous season.
The <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%20Lafayette%20Leopards%20men%27s%20basketball%20team">Leopards</a> finished the <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20men%27s%20basketball%20season">2015–16 season</a> 6–24, 3–15 in Patriot League play to finish in last place. They lost to <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%20Navy%20Midshipmen%20men%27s%20basketball%20team">Navy</a> in the first round of the <a href="2016%20Patriot%20League%20Men%27s%20Basketball%20Tournament">Patriot League Tournament</a>.
